direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve margin-related data but for different contexts (isolated vs. cross margin).
Both methods handle similar data structures and parameters related to margin data.
Both methods access and manage isolated margin account limits and data.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for accessing tier data.
Setting up the environment is necessary before querying margin tier data.
Verifying the margin tier data ensures the correctness of the retrieved information.
